name: Fruited Tofu Curry Salad
author: Jennifer J
summary: Vegetarian salad, with a lot of flavor. Serve as a meal or as a side dish on a bed of lettuce or in pita pockets. Tofu may also be pan fried in a small amount of oil with a tablespoon of curry powder instead of boiling method.
ingredients: 2 cups extra-firm tofu, drained and cubed
directions: In a saucepan bring water to a boil
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes; set aside
Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Cook cubed tofu for 3 minutes; drain, and set aside to cool
In a bowl, blend yogurt with lime juice and curry powder; set aside
In a large mixing bowl, toss together halved grapes, cranberries, celery, green onions, walnuts, rice, and tofu
Drizzle with curry dressing, and toss until well coated
Season to taste with salt and pepper, as desired
